title: Towards DM-free search for Fast Radio Bursts with Machine Learning -- I. An implementation on multibeam data
summary: Searching for fleeting radio transients like fast radio bursts (FRBs) with wide-field radio telescopes has become a common challenge in data-intensive science. Conventional algorithms normally cost enormous time to seek candidates by finding the correct dispersion measures, of which the process is so-called dedispersion.
